item.title: Developing a System Maintenance Plan and Utilizing Python to Aid in System Maintenance
item.description:
Description

Overtime, systems can experience rapid growth and become unstable without proper management. Managing that growth while maintaining the system can become a challenge. We will explore system maintenance in the context of a Geographic Information Systems (GIS) Teamâ€™s plan for GIS system maintenance. We will go over the reasons for having a system maintenance plan, the components of our plan, and things to consider when making your own maintenance plan.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Guzi
